title: Chapter 1524 - Origin Trace
body:
Chapter 1524 - Origin Trace

Beneath the night sky.

The man in a changshan examined the traces left on the battlefield, the depths of his gaze shining with inscrutable profound light.

Shortly afterward, he furrowed his brow, raised his right hand, formed a hand seal, and said, “Trace!”

Whoosh~

Murky gray rain spread out, like ripples on the surface of a pool. Before long, curtains of light arose on the devastated landscape, each reflecting scenes of the recent past.

As if going back in time.

Scenes of Su Yi’s battle with the three Void Realm True Immortals played out in full detail.

The man in a changshan just stood there, watching carefully. It wasn’t long before he’d picked up on numerous extraordinary hints.

“That arrow struck out of nowhere, yet he managed to block it. That proves that he sensed that there’d be an attempt to intercept him tonight.

“In just seven snaps of the fingers, the battle reached a life-or-death juncture. It seems he realized how dire the situation was, and he used some sort of hidden card right off the bat.

“Whatever it was, it was strong enough to kill Void Realm True Immortals in an instant!

“Furthermore, both his methods...
